cause.description:
Have you ever been to a VA hospital? Is this the only healthcare available to some in your family?
Getting an appointment is nearly impossible. Once you get one, you're lucky to be treated for what you went in for. Doctors get paid regardless of how they treat their patients or whether the patients are treated at all.
1. Many veterans need extended care due to injury and age. Unfortunately, what is thought to be intensive or special care rarely is.
cause.mission: make sure vets really are cared for
cause.name: Veterans Affairs Hospital Reform
